Omnipotence.quote: With God all things are possible. (Matthew 19:26)

Omniscience.quote: O Lord, you have searched me and known me. (Psalm 139:1)

Omnipresence.quote: Where can I go from your Spirit? Where can I flee from your presence? (Psalm 139:7)

Justice.quote: Righteousness and justice are the foundation of your throne. (Psalm 89:14)

Grace.quote: For it is by grace you have been saved, through faithâ€”and this is not from yourselves, it is the gift of God. (Ephesians 2:8)

Creator.quote: In the beginning God created the heavens and the earth. (Genesis 1:1)

Sustainer.quote: He sustains all things by the word of his power. (Hebrews 1:3)

Redeemer.quote: For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son. (John 3:16)

Judge.quote: For we must all appear before the judgment seat of Christ. (2 Corinthians 5:10)

Immanence.quote: Closer to you than your jugular vein. (Hadith Qudsi)

Transcendence.quote: Holy, holy, holy is the Lord God Almighty, who was, and is, and is to come. (Revelation 4:8)

Eternity.quote: From everlasting to everlasting you are God. (Psalm 90:2)

Immutability.quote: I the Lord do not change. (Malachi 3:6)

Holiness.quote: Be holy, because I am holy. (Leviticus 11:44)

Truth.quote: I am the way and the truth and the life. (John 14:6)

Light.quote: God is light; in him there is no darkness at all. (1 John 1:5)

Love.quote: And so we know and rely on the love God has for us. God is love. (1 John 4:16)

Wisdom.quote: The Lord by wisdom founded the earth; by understanding he established the heavens. (Proverbs 3:19)

Providence.quote: And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose. (Romans 8:28)

Sovereignty.quote: The Lord reigns forever; he has established his throne for judgment. (Psalm 9:7)

Forgiveness.quote: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just and will forgive us our sins and purify us from all unrighteousness. (1 John 1:9)

Compassion.quote: But you, Lord, are a compassionate and gracious God, slow to anger, abounding in love and faithfulness. (Psalm 86:15)

Wrath.quote: For the wrath of God is revealed from heaven against all ungodliness and unrighteousness of men. (Romans 1:18)

Beauty.quote: Splendor and majesty are before him; strength and beauty are in his sanctuary. (Psalm 96:6)
